## take() function

Returns a new array with first `n` elemenets of `array`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function take<T>(array: readonly T[], n: number): T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | readonly T\[\] | The target array |
|  n | number | non-negative integer |

<b>Returns:</b>

T\[\]

A new array
